headline: Wall Street Bullish on Huntington Bancshares (HBAN), Here’s Why
summary: ​Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (NASDAQ:HBAN) is among the Best Affordable Stocks Under $40 to Buy. Wall Street has an overall positive opinion on Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (NASDAQ:HBAN), with analysts’ 12-month price target reflecting more than 21% upside from the current level. ​Recently, on February 12, Brian Foran from Truist Financial reiterated a Buy rating on the […]
